item.title: Over the Garden Wall
item.author: blazeva1 -a- fit.cvut.cz <Václav Blažej> (Václav Blažej)
item.description: I heard about Over The Garden Wall ↗ series for the first time two days ago. It is an almost 10 years old miniseries with runtime of 1 hour 40 minutes. It is rare to find a series with so much care given to it; I can wholeheartedly recommend it. The miniseries format gives it a short runtime and gave the creators incentive to tie all the knots, an important feature that I seek in any series that I consider watching. I will not do a thorough analysis of the series as it seems internet has enough of those.
